description: Detects svchost hosting RDP termsvcs communicating with the loopback address and on TCP port 3389 Author: Samir Bousseaden. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: RDP Over Reverse SSH Tunnel
query: ((process.executable:*\\svchost.exe AND winlog.event_data.Initiated:"true" AND source.port:"3389") AND (destination.ip:127.* OR destination.ip:"\:\:1"))
